Open the "Phone" application.
Open the Contacts app and then tap "Allow" to permit notifications.
Click the plus icon to create a new contact.
Click the "First name" text field to input the contact's first name.
Input "John" into the "Last name" field.
Type "Doe" into the "Phone" field.
Click "Mobile" to select the mobile phone label.
Type "123-456-7890" into the phone number field.
